AssetProperty.description: The asset property's definition, alias, unit, and notification state.

LogicalId.markdownDescription:
Customer provided ID for property.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: [^\u0000-\u001F\u007F]+  
Update requires: No interruption

Alias.description: The property alias that identifies the property.
Alias.markdownDescription:
The property alias that identifies the property.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

NotificationState.description: The MQTT notification state (ENABLED or DISABLED) for this asset property.
NotificationState.markdownDescription:
The MQTT notification state (ENABLED or DISABLED) for this asset property.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ENABLED | DISABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

Unit.description: The unit of measure (such as Newtons or RPM) of the asset property. If you don't specify a value for this parameter, the service uses the value of the assetModelProperty in the asset model.
Unit.markdownDescription:
The unit of measure (such as Newtons or RPM) of the asset property. If you don't specify a value for this parameter, the service uses the value of the assetModelProperty in the asset model.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
